basicInfo.name: Rakan Douli
basicInfo.title: Web Developer
basicInfo.summary: Specializing in Next.js, React, and Node.js, with a background in business development and tech. Experienced in building internal tools, optimizing user experience, and enhancing performance for applications at companies like Fiber Nederland, Mprise, and Direct Impact. Skilled in developing API-driven components, SEO, and A/B testing. Known for adaptability and collaboration, honed through international work experience.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed and maintained Vue.js and Laravel applications for internal tools.
Troubleshot bugs and implemented features to enhance application functionality.
Improved user experience by optimizing the shop app, resulting in a more streamlined user interface and experience.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed new features and resolved bugs in multiple web applications using React, Node.js, and GraphQL, significantly improving app functionality and user experience.
Conducted load testing on the database gateway to optimize app performance, leading to faster data retrieval and improved resource allocation.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Built and styled components with React/Next.js to improve website functionality and user experience in a headless CMS environment.
Created and managed Contentful CMS components and used GraphQL to enhance data management and retrieval speed.
Performed web and A/B testing using Google Optimize and Sitespect, increasing conversion rates and overall website performance.
Designed HTML email templates in Mandrillapp, resulting in improved customer engagement and satisfaction.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
details: Developed custom WordPress themes using LESS and Vanilla JavaScript/jQuery for enhanced front-end functionality.
Increased site visibility through SEO improvements, leading to better search rankings and organic traffic.
Improved overall website performance, contributing to a seamless user experience.

experience.title: Sales Prompter
details: Provided exceptional customer service and utilized persuasive communication skills to drive sales and promote products.

experience.title: Graphic Designer & Translator
details: Designed visual materials such as posters, flyers, and brochures.
Created an Arabic-language Facebook page, managing translations and content for increased engagement.

experience.title: Logistics Employee
details: Oversaw logistics and managed exports to Iraq, ensuring efficient and timely deliveries.

experience.title: Account Manager
details: Managed over 50 customer accounts, addressing payment and invoicing issues and maintaining positive client relations.
Used Sage accounting software to streamline inventory management, boosting team productivity by 50%.
Created monthly sales reports for regional offices, improving insights into sales performance.

experience.title: Sales Promoter
details: Managed the Toshiba television section, providing product expertise to increase sales.
Recognized as the Best TV Sales Promoter for outstanding sales performance.
